info.name: Tumblr Paranormal Activity
info.description: Hides the graph in the sideboard and changes name to "Paranormal Activity" or anything you want to have there.
info.additionalInfo:
Hides the sibeboard Activity graph without affecting and hiding follower count or any other count. Changes name to "Paranormal activity", which can be easily rewritten to anything, simply change "Paranormal Activity" to anything you wan to have there, just don't delete the quotation marks..

UPDATE 2014 MAY 14 - 
. stupid of me not to add it sooner, now it also works under protected connection (https)
. also I reduced the space in code, no change in function.

UPDATE 2014 OCT 30 - 
. new ass theme, icon got overlapped with text, should work now.

*** For it to show correctly in Firefox, change 
padding-left:30px!important; 
to
padding-left:0px!important;

obsolete.message: unsupported, tumblr changed a lot, no longer works
